title: Sarah Jessica Parker Is Looking for Something New: Reprising Roles May Be the ‘Most Lucrative’ But It’s the ‘Least Satisfying’
summary: Sarah Jessica Parker may be the perfect person to receive the Golden Globes’ Carol Burnett Award — despite feeling “not worthy” of the honor. “My mom and my dad met doing a local production of ‘Once Upon a Mattress’ in Athens, Ohio. He walked into the audition to the theater where they were auditio…
